text:
"Viva la Vida" is a song by the English band Coldplay from their album, "Viva la Vida or Death and All His Friends". The album was released on 7 May 2008. It was the band's first number one single in both the United Kingdom and the United States.
Coldplay sung the song on The Simpsons episode, "Million Dollar Maybe".
